name: Stupid Bulb Boy
description:
One light bulb was destroyed in the making of this game, with a hammer, to make the sound effect of it breaking.

Disclaimer-

Despite having 7 days to make this game, I was only able to devote 2 days
to it due to having so many problems the first 5 days and having to complete redesign and rebuild a new game at the last minute. This is my first jam I've been in where I used Unity and finally successfully completed a "playable" game, so I'm happy.

Controls-

WASD works for jumping and moving left/right

You can jump with SPACE bar as well.

ARROW keys work same as WASD

Gamepad works(at least my XBOX 360 does)

Instructions-

Collect all the diamonds on each stage, avoid touching sawblades, and
get to the door before the clock runs out(technically you should try to get to the door a few seconds before it runs out, there is a little bug, you may end up catching it.
